Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.AbstractController
it.polimi.ingsw.view.client.gui.controllers.GameController
public class GameController extends AbstractController
Class representing Game controller. The client can interact with the LivingRoom, the Bookshelf and the Chat. Shows the client's Bookshelf and PersonalGoalCard, the other players Bookshelves, the LivingRoom, the current player, the ending token, the CommonGoalCards, and the ranking.

  • Field Summary

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Sets this in the GUInterface. Sets the gap between LivingRoom tiles. Sets the gap between client Bookshelf tiles. Sets the gap between Bookshelves tiles. Sets the columns buttons. Sets the CommonGoalCard ImageViews. Creates the Chat Stage and loads the Chat scene.

    • setCurrentPlayer

      public void setCurrentPlayer(String currentPlayer)
      Sets the current player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - The nickname of the player to set as current.

    • setNickname

      public void setNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the nickname of the client.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the client.

    • disconnectionInGame

      public void disconnectionInGame()
      Notifies the client that has been disconnected from the server.

    • playerDisconnectionInGame

      public void playerDisconnectionInGame()
      Notifies the client that a player has disconnected, and the game has ended.

    • endGame

      public void endGame(String winner)
      Notifies the client that the game has ended, and shows the winner and the ranking.
      Parameters:
      winner - The player that has won.

    • setLivingRoomGridPane

      public void setLivingRoomGridPane(Map<Position,Item> livingRoom)
      Sets the Items in the LivingRoom.
      Parameters:
      livingRoom - A Map of the LivingRoom.

    • selectItem

      public void selectItem(Position position)
      Selects or deselects the Item clicked by the user in the LivingRoom.
      Parameters:
      position - Position selected by the user.

    • selectFromLivingRoom

      public void selectFromLivingRoom() throws IOException
      Sends the Items selected to the GUInterface.
      Throws:
      IOException - Error in I/O.

    • setChosenItems

      public void setChosenItems(List<Item> chosenItems)
      Sets the chosen Items in the ImageViews above the Bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      chosenItems - List of chosen Items.

    • clearTilesList

      public void clearTilesList()
      Clears the chosen tiles in the LivingRoom.

    • resetOpacity

      public void resetOpacity()
      Resets the opacity of the selected tiles in the LivingRoom when the selection is gone wrong.

      public void clearSelectedItems()
      Clears the selectedItems when the items selection is gone wrong.

    • failedSelection

      public void failedSelection()
      Notifies the client that the items selection is gone wrong.

      Orders the ImageViews selected.
      Parameters:

    • selectColumn

      Inserts the ImageViews in the selected order in the Bookshelf, when the insertion is successful.

    • clearChosenItemsImageView

      public void clearChosenItemsImageView()
      Clears the ImageViews above the Bookshelf, when the insertion is successful.

      Notifies the client that the insertion is gone wrong.

      Parameters:

    • updateBookshelf

      public void updateBookshelf(String owner, Map<Position,Item> update)
      Updates the Bookshelf of a player.
      Parameters:
      owner - The owner of the Bookshelf.
      update - The new updated Bookshelf.

    • updateCommonGoalCards

      public void updateCommonGoalCards(Map<Integer,Integer> commonGoalCards)
      Sets the CommonGoalCard descriptions, top tokens and ImageViews the first time that is called. Afterwards it only updates the top tokens.
      Parameters:
      commonGoalCards - A Map of the CommonGoalCards.

    • setEndingToken

      public void setEndingToken(String owner)
      Sets the ending token.
      Parameters:
      owner - The owner of the ending token.

    • setScores

      public void setScores(Map<String,Integer> newScores)
      Sets the scores of the players in the rankingLabel.
      Parameters:
      newScores - A Map of the new scores.

    • enterChat

      public void enterChat()
      Shows the Chat Stage when the enterChatButton is clicked.

    • reconnectionInGame

      public void reconnectionInGame(String nickname)
      Notifies that a player has reconnected, and it adds back his bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player that has reconnected.

    • disconnectionInGame

      public void disconnectionInGame(String nickname)
      Notifies that a player has disconnected, and it removes his bookshelf. If only one player has remained, it notifies that the game will end in 30 seconds.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname of the player that has disconnected.
